pageContext.claim: “Yes, we are doing very well at 3.2% GDP, but with our wonderfully low inflation, we could be setting major records &, at the same time, make our National Debt start to look small!”
pageContext.analysis: First quarter 2019 GDP was 3.1 percent, up from 2.2 percent in the fourth quarter of 2018. The national deficit to GDP ratio has only increased under President Trump.
